channel.title: biomonitoring on The McCann Lab
channel.description: Recent content in biomonitoring on The McCann Lab

item.title: Monitoring Biodiversity and Biostructure
item.description: A recent article by Dr. Bailey McMeans and others argues that there is a consistent response of biodiversity to human impacts, from individual level attributes to whole ecosystems. This integration across scales, seldom considered in a discipline often separated by scales suggests that there exists an overarching framework for biomonitoring ecosystems under human impact. The paper is is published in Ecological Monographs.
